Title: PPE Detection using YOLOv8
Description: Designed a computer vision pipeline using YOLOv8 and OpenCV by training two separate models for person and PPE detection. Implemented a sequential approach where detected persons were cropped and passed to the PPE model. Improved detection accuracy by 15%.

Title: Chennai Weather Forecast using Time Series
Description: Conducted time series analysis on Chennai weather forecast data by performing preprocessing EDA and applying SARIMAX and LSTM models. Achieved a forecasting accuracy improvement of 18% over baseline models enabling more reliable weather trend predictions.
